          <title>
            <string language="fr">L'effet de la pesanteur sur la direction de croissance des pousses de plantes</string>
            <string language="en">The effect of gravity on the growth direction of plant shoots</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Effekt von Schwerkraft auf der 
Wachstumrichtung der Betriebseintragfäden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O efeito da gravidade no sentido do crescimento 
de tiros da planta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'effetto di gravità sul senso di sviluppo dei 
tiri della pianta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επίδραση της βαρύτητας στην κατεύθυνση αύξησης των 
βλαστών εγκαταστάσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El efecto de la gravedad en la dirección del 
crecimiento de los lanzamientos de la planta</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre une expérience qui détermine dans quelle direction des pousses de plante poussent quand une  plante est cultivée à l'envers.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experiment which determines the growth direction of plant shoots when a plant is grown upside down.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cadre foncé</string>
            <string language="en">dark box</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">jours</string>
            <string language="en">days</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">force</string>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pesanteur</string>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croissance</string>
            <string language="en">growth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">usine</string>
            <string language="en">plant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pousses</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">à l'envers</string>
            <string language="en">upside down</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einem Experiment, welches 
die Wachstumrichtung der Betriebseintragfäden feststellt, wenn ein 
Betrieb gewachsene Oberseite unten ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a uma experiência qual 
determina o sentido do crescimento de tiros da planta quando uma 
planta é crescida de cabeça para baixo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra ad un esperimento 
quale determina il senso di sviluppo dei tiri della pianta quando una 
pianta si sviluppa inversa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα πείραμα που 
καθορίζει την κατεύθυνση αύξησης των βλαστών εγκαταστάσεων όταν 
αυξάνεται ανάποδα ένα φυτό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a experimento cuál 
determina la dirección del crecimiento de los lanzamientos de la 
planta cuando se crece al revés una planta.</string>
          </description>
